302.description: Redirect to the frontend with authentication token

get.summary: Get business details for the authenticated user

user_id.description: The ID of the user associated with the business

business_email.description: The email address of the business (optional)

phone.description: The phone number of the business

bank_name.description: The name of the bank associated with the business

account_number.description: The bank account number of the business

profile_picture.description: Profile picture URL of the business (optional)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the business details to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the business details to delete

post.summary: Update business details for the authenticated user

certificate.description: New certificate file (only required if certificate_status is 'new')

profile_picture.description: New profile picture file (only required if profile_picture_status is 'new')

302.description: Redirect to the frontend with the authentication token

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: ID of the product to fetch feedback for

404.description: No feedback found for the product

example.message: No feedback found for the product

get.summary: Get a specific order for the current user

parameters.description: ID of the order to retrieve

items.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, svg) of up to 2MB

parameters.description: ID of the product to update

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: ID of the user whose products are to be fetched

parameters.name: distance
parameters.description: Distance from the user's location (in kilometers)

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search term for filtering products by name

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: ID of the category to filter by

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of products to filter by
